episode.text: Welcome to Waves of the day podcast, where we discuss the latest advancements in artificial intelligence and machine learning. I'm your host, pragya.
And I'm raman. Today, we're going to talk about Smallest dot ai, a groundbreaking platform that's making AI more accessible and efficient for everyone.
That's right, raman. Smallest dot AI is designed to provide powerful Speech AI tools that are easy to use, even for those who may not have a deep technical background.
Exactly. This means that businesses and developers can deploy AI solutions on devices with limited resources.
That's it for today. Stay tuned for more updates. Thanks for listening!
